content: of the peachy peachy socks by debbie ford page 3 abbreviations k - knit ssk - sl 1 knitwise sl 1 knitwise place both sts back on left needle and k2tog through the p - purl back loop st/s - stitch/s yo - yarn over co - cast on bor - beginning of round pm - place marker k tbl - k 1 st through the back loop sm - slip marker 1/1 lc - slip next stitch to cable needle and sl - slip 1 st purlwise place at front of work k1 then k1 from cable needle k2tog - knit 2 sts together 1/1 rc - slip next stitch to cable needle and m - marker place at back of work k1 then k1 from cable needle written instructions round 1 k tbl p1 k2 p1 k tbl p1 k2 k2tog yo k3 x2 p1 k tbl p1 k2 p1 k tbl 28 sts round 2 k tbl p1 k2 p1 k tbl p1 k1 k2tog yo k1 yo ssk k1 x2 p1 k tbl p1 k2 p1 k tbl round 3 k tbl p1 k2 p1 k tbl p1 k2tog yo k3 yo ssk x2 p1 k tbl p1 k2 p1 k tbl round 4 k tbl p1 1/1 rc p1 k tbl p1 k1 p5 k1 x2 p1 k tbl p1 1/1 lc p1 k tbl round 5 k tbl p1 k2 p1 k tbl p1 yo ssk k5 x2 p1 k tbl p1 k2 p1 k tbl round 6 k tbl p1 k2 p1 k tbl p1 k1 yo ssk p2 k2tog yo x2 p1 k tbl p1 k2 p1 k tbl round 7 k tbl p1 k2 p1 k tbl p1 k2 yo ssk k2tog yo k1 x2 p1 k tbl p1 k2 p1 k tbl round 8 k tbl p1 1/1 rc p1 k tbl p1 k14 p1 k tbl p1 1/1 lc p1 k tbl peachy chart peachy socks by debbie ford page 4
